base_description: Gray rectangular cabinet with drawers and doors.
part_description: Includes one drawer and one door on the left, with a handle on each. The top has a recessed section for additional use. The drawer and door are aligned vertically.
internal_interaction_description: The drawer slides in and out of the cabinet smoothly, providing access to its contents. The door swings open on hinges, allowing access to the storage space inside. The handles facilitate easy opening and closing of both the drawer and door, ensuring functionality.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed in kitchens or bathrooms, providing storage space for utensils or toiletries. It interacts with users through its handles for opening, and its flat top can support objects like a sink or decorative items. Its design complements various interior styles.
